thread.title: Leading marriage equality advocate Warren Entsch on his plan for a binding plebiscite
thread.title_full: Leading marriage equality advocate Warren Entsch on his plan for a binding plebiscite

author: ABC Radio National
title: Leading marriage equality advocate Warren Entsch on his plan for a binding plebiscite
text:
Thursday 22 October 2015 8:48AM (view full episode) 
Divisions have erupted in the Liberal Party over the issue of marriage equality. 
Liberal MP Warren Entsch has taken a plan to the Prime Minister — to legislate before next year's election — to make the outcome of the plebiscite on same-sex marriage binding on the party, and the Parliament. 
Leading conservative Eric Abetz says its an ambush. 
Marriage equality advocate and Liberal MP Warren Entsch joins RN Breakfast 's Political Editor Alison Carabine.
